content: आध्वर्यव {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (वी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [अध्वर्योः इदं अञ्] {@--1@} Belonging to the {%adhvaryu%} (<ab>q. v.</ab>) or to the Yajur-veda. {@--2@} One conversant with the Yajurveda; ( <ls>P. IV. 3. 123</ls>). --वं {@--1@} Service at a sacrifice. {@--2@} Particularly, the office of an Adhvaryu priest.
